duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative support to customers on insurance policies, billing questions, policy changes, rate changes, and discounts.
Act as an extension of agents to provide additional support to customers beyond regular business hours.
Utilize communication skills to proactively share knowledge and provide a positive customer experience.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account related questions from customers.
Stay current with relevant products and participate in industry-related courses to expand product and system knowledge.
Meet or exceed performance measurement goals and suggest innovative process changes to support business practices.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (Four-year college degree preferred)
